name: html5-qrcode
description: a cross platform HTML5 QR Code scanner

scripts.build: find assets/*.* -print0| xargs -0  -i{} bash -c 'echo  s%{}%data\:\;base64\,$(base64 -w0 {})%g'|sed -i -f - html5-qrcode.js && babel html5-qrcode.js -d transpiled && echo 'code transpiled' && minify transpiled/html5-qrcode.js --out-file minified/tmp.js
scripts.postbuild: cp third_party/qrcode.min.js minified/html5-qrcode.min.js && cat minified/tmp.js >> minified/html5-qrcode.min.js && rm minified/tmp.js && echo 'minifed and combined'

author: minhazav@gmail.com
